a1.name: George Orwell
a1.about: Eric Arthur Blair, better known by his pen name George Orwell, was an English novelist and essayist, journalist and critic

a2.name: Joseph Heller
a2.about: Joseph Heller was an American author of novels, short stories, plays, and screenplays

a3.name: Franz Kafka
a3.about: Franz Kafka was a German-speaking Bohemian novelist and short-story writer, widely regarded as one of the major figures of 20th-century literature.
